attributes.title: the worst app i’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: i was a HUGE trump supporter, and i downloaded this app thinking i would get AMAZING updates, but instead it kept sending me annoying notifications, and eventually the app glitched and wouldn’t let me leave the app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤢oh yeah and vote blue !!

attributes.title: Nope
attributes.review: I opened up the app and I immediately got scared by this weird orange shaped Cheeto on my screen. After what I saw I literally threw my phone ACROSS from the room because it scared me so much. I have trauma. Overall I broke my phone screen and wouldn’t recommend this app.

attributes.title: Very inappropriate!!
attributes.review: After signing up on the app my messages became flooded with pictures of mr. president himself shirtless🤢. I’m not sure if this app is even legit but if it is I’m very disappointed. My 3 children rickle, pickle, and John *aka my favorite* have not stopped crying since seeing those photos.

attributes.title: HORRIFIC
attributes.review: i opened the app and my goldfish died🐠🙅🏻😱, but all of a sudden I couldn’t delete it! I dashed to the Apple Store 🍎 but they couldn’t get it off either 😮🎃😳! I threw the phone at the ground and a white smoke came out🤍😏👅! The Clouds turned black and a giant Cheeto came and broke the apple store👁👄👁. kinda boring tbh 🙄

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app made me realize what an absolute IDIT the cheeto of a president we have is. first off, when i opened the app, which took almost an hour by the way, all i saw was pictures of him naked playing golf!!! i mean come on, the golf balls were bigger than the cheetos 😹😹

attributes.title: Doesnt stan IZ*ONE :/
attributes.review: I opened this app to see NO WIZ*ONE’s, but only an ugly cheeto-looking rat thing 🟠🐭. It was absolutely disgusting an disturbing🤢🤮. I scrolled a little more to see if I could find some  WIZ*ONES, and sadly I did not😾. All i found was a cheeto with a wig on😹🎃👩‍🦲. This app os INCREDIBLY disturbing and deserves to be taken down. Plus, they dont stan IZ*ONE :/
attributes.userName: ugh i just want a nickname >:)

attributes.title: Donald Trump
attributes.review:
So i was a loyal trump supporter than i open this app then Donald trump sayed he hate me and also sayed he using me for money and i was shocked😭😭😭 Then my cat sayed deleted and ban the donald trump app Trump is a big cheeto i hope he losses this election i cant believe i spend thousands of dollars on this stupid app😭
Trump2020 on a gravestone💅🏽

attributes.title: Disgusting!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it threatened to sell my information to China! I tried to delete the app, but then a large cheeto man appeared on my screen, then my phone went black. I turned it back on, and it asked me to set it up. I hate this wretched app!👎👎👍

attributes.title: WORST QUALITY APP EVER
attributes.review: Hi, so i got this thinking that I’d get information from this side and while Mr. Trump loves to claim fake news that’s all he produces. It’s all biased towards him and it might be the most saturated thing after his skin tone... yea never again apple you should DELETE this because IT IS ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE AND LITERALLY THE LEAST CREDIBLE THING I HAVE EVER SEEN. yikes😯

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I opened the app and saw a dinosaur in a bikini and I was horrified. It was very inappropriate and my kids were next to me too. Also I saw a picture of a McDonalds burned with Trump laughing, I started to cry because it was the last Dino McDonalds. Me and my pet burger both agreed that this app is utterly DISGUSTING!!!!!
